detail_desc: Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Set in soft, washed organic cotton slub jersey. Top with short butterfly sleeves and a button placket. Shorts with elastication at the waist and frills at the sides and hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and 3/4-length legs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long nightshirt in soft cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and slits in the sides with ties. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the top and a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and taped details on the legs.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Calf-length dress in mesh and chiffon with a bead-embroidered bodice in a narrow cut at the top. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in one side and an open back. Seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps, a wide flounced layer at the top and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Boxy-style, oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front, patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.
Soft, non-wired bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.

Shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-stud fastenings, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-stud cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Microfibre and mesh Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Long sleeves with a gently gathered seam at the top and elasticated smocking with ties and a frill trim at the cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with a glittery section at the back, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.

Long-sleeved dance dress in glossy jersey with a velour front, a print motif and appliqué at the top, and concealed hook and loop fastening at the back. Glittery elastic seam at the waist, a detachable tail at the back and a glittery skirt in three layers of tulle. Lined gusset.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
All-in-one suit in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.

A pair of shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a ribbing at the waist. Soft brushed inside..
Short, pleated skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip in one side and grosgrain trim at the hem. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in soft velvet with peak lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long bandeau dress in an airy weave with draping and a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the bodice. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a narrow trim around the neckline and buttons at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Nursing poncho in a soft fine knit containing some wool. Open at one side for easier nursing access.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in jersey.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Cotton chambray shirt with a button-down collar, French front, chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Soft, non-wired microfibre bra with lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Frill trim around the cups and an elastic trim at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a deep round neckline, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Trousers in soft slub cotton jersey with sections in woven fabric. Elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.

Knee-length dress in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, flap chest pockets with a button, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Padded footmuff in woven fabric. Elasticated hood with a detachable faux fur trim and concealed zips at the front with chin guards. Fleece lining.

Mesh negligee with an integral push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless dress in a soft weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a velvet ribbon and sewn-on velvet bow, and a gently flared skirt with gathers at the top. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps.
Transparent plastic shopper with handles in crocodile-patterned imitation leather at the top. Size 11x28x32 cm.
Wide, V-neck jumper in waffle-knit cotton with hard-worn details, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and twisted side seams.
Short-sleeved top in an airy mulberry silk weave with a round neckline and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a frill-trimmed, ribbed turtleneck, long sleeves with a ribbed flounce at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a cotton weave with contrasting colour trims at the sides. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton chambray trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Suede slip-on trainers with an elastic gore in one side and fabric loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Pleats at the front and a box pleat at the back. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Pyjama top and shorts in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a small print motif above the hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative satin bow at the waist.
Short, elasticated necklace in plastic with a metal pendant.
Shorts in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
